Key Match Events: Cole Palmer scored a penalty in the 60th minute
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored England's second goal with a swerving volley
Pre-Game Insights: Southgate must cut seven players from his 33-man preliminary squad for the Euros
Palmer and Eze demonstrated a lack of fear and demanded possession
Southgate is unsure how best to use Ezri Konsa, who was used at left-back, right-back, and centre-half
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate was satisfied with the performance and noted that fresh players brought in showed promise
Southgate highlighted the displays of Eberechi Eze and Cole Palmer
Southgate expressed relief that no new injuries were sustained
Miscellaneous Highlights: A near-sellout 50,061 crowd was at St James' Park
Kieran Trippier, the Newcastle captain, was the captain for the night for his country
Jordan Pickford received a mixed reception from the crowd
